name: Letters - a written adventure (First prototype)
description:
This is the early prototype of game "Letters - a written adventure", which was made in 2017 to test game mechanic.

The Players takes on the role of Sarah, who reminisces her friendship with her longtime pen pal, Sasha. By navigating Sarah through her old letters, players learn more about the two and change the course of their friendship. Since Sarah likes to draw, all her letters are full of drawings which block the player’s way. If the pictures are combined with words from the text, they will change
and let the players pass.

Playable with an Xbox controller!
